scripts.prebuild: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p='package.json';const j=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8'));const v=String(j.version||'1.0.0').split('.').map(Number);if(v.length<3||v.some(Number.isNaN)){throw new Error('Invalid version format')}const minor=Math.max(0,v[1]||0);const patch=Math.max(0,v[2]||0)+1;j.version=['1',String(minor),String(patch)].join('.');fs.writeFileSync(p,JSON.stringify(j,null,2)+'\n');console.log('ITSM v'+j.version);"
scripts.db:setup: npm run db:init && npm run db:seed
